Name: DAMN!
About the game: DAMN! is a lightning fast twin-stick-shooter packed with action. Play through 25 missions, each with different objectives. Use a variety of weapons like the Shotgun, Flamethrower, Redirect Laser, Chain Gun, Mine Layer and more and defeat a multitude of enemies! Take on the Arena levels and blast your way to the top spot on the Steam leaderboards! DAMN! has an 'easy to learn, hard to master' play style for maximum mindless fun!
Meta Title: DAMN!: Sep 8, 2017, 7 Raven Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on DAMN!? Check out the release date (Sep 8, 2017), developer insights from 7 Raven Studios, and a complete game summary.
